advancement.echotweaks.adventure.all_flo: Have every Flower in your inventory
advancement.echotweaks.adventure.overkil: Deal 10 hearts of damage in a single hit
advancement.echotweaks.husbandry.collect: Have all 16 wool colors in your inventory
advancement.echotweaks.husbandry.nest_bu: Have a Bundle inside a Bundle inside... Well, you get it.
advancement.echotweaks.husbandry.obtain_: Use a Netherite Ingot to upgrade a Hoe
advancement.echotweaks.husbandry.break_n: Use a Netherite Hoe until it breaks, and then reevaluate your life choices
advancement.echotweaks.story.fill_cobble: Open a single Chest to be greeted by 1,728 Cobblestone
advancement.echotweaks.story.fill_furnac: Completely fill your Inventory with Furnaces
